snippet: The Day: Renee Katz has remained an enduring symbol of how even though the city is now much safer than it was in 1979, the normal order can come unglued without warning.
abstract: The Day: Renee Katz has remained an enduring symbol of how even though the city is now much safer than it was in 1979, the normal order can come unglued without warning.

headline.main: Not Silenced, 33 Years After Her Own Subway Nightmare
